member.name: T:RDotNet.NativeLibrary.NativeUtility
member.summary: Collection of utility methods for operating systems.

member.name: M:RDotNet.NativeLibrary.NativeUtility.GetPlatform
member.summary: Gets the platform on which the current process runs.
member.remarks: 's platform is not even on Mac OS X. This method returns when the current process runs on Mac OS X. This method uses UNIX's uname command to check the operating system, so this method cannot check the OS correctly if the PATH environment variable is changed (will returns ).

member.name: M:RDotNet.NativeLibrary.NativeUtility.ExecCommand(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Execute a command in a new process
member.returns: The output of the command to the standard output stream

member.name: M:RDotNet.NativeLibrary.NativeUtility.SetEnvironmentVariables(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the PATH to the R binaries and R_HOME environment variables if needed.
member.param: The path of the directory containing the R native library. If null (default), this function tries to locate the path via the Windows registry, or commonly used locations on MacOS and Linux
The path for R_HOME. If null (default), the function checks the R_HOME environment variable. If none is set, the function uses platform specific sensible default behaviors.
member.remarks: This function has been designed to limit the tedium for users, while allowing custom settings for unusual installations.

member.name: M:RDotNet.NativeLibrary.NativeUtility.GetRHomeEnvironmentVariable
member.summary: Gets the value, if any, of the R_HOME environment variable of the current process
member.returns: The value, or null if not set

member.name: M:RDotNet.NativeLibrary.NativeUtility.FindRHome(System.String)
member.summary: Try to locate the directory path to use for the R_HOME environment variable. This is used by R.NET by default; users may want to use it to diagnose problematic behaviors.
member.param: Optional path to the directory containing the R shared library. This is ignored unless on a Unix platform (i.e. ignored on Windows and MacOS)
member.returns: The path that R.NET found suitable as a candidate for the R_HOME environment

member.name: M:RDotNet.NativeLibrary.NativeUtility.GetRVersionFromRegistry
member.summary: Gets the R version from the Windows R Registry (if available)

member.name: M:RDotNet.NativeLibrary.NativeUtility.FindRPath(System.String)
member.summary: Attempt to find a suitable path to the R shared library. This is used by R.NET by default; users may want to use it to diagnose problematic behaviors.
member.returns: The path to the directory where the R shared library is expected to be

member.name: M:RDotNet.NativeLibrary.NativeUtility.FindRPathFromRegistry
member.summary: Windows-only function; finds in the Windows registry the path to the most recently installed R binaries.

member.name: M:RDotNet.NativeLibrary.NativeUtility.GetRLibraryFileName
member.summary: Gets the default file name of the R library on the supported platforms.

member.name: P:RDotNet.NativeLibrary.NativeUtility.SetEnvironmentVariablesLog
member.summary: Gets a log of the changes made to environment variables via the NativeUtility

member.name: P:RDotNet.NativeLibrary.NativeUtility.IsUnix
member.summary: Is the platform a unix like (Unix or MacOX)
